htmlBody: A simple yet inspiring post, much like the good work that you have wrought. Good job Henry!
Thank you for donating 50% of your income Henry. You could have gone on a holiday or bought something fancy for yourself but you have chosen to help others in need instead. It's admirable.
I love the donation live-streams on your website!

GiveWell has identified several new giving opportunities! They're just not listed under "top charities" at the moment. See info on their aims for next year here: https://blog.givewell.org/2022/11/23/giving-recommendations-2022/
